scripts.prep:dist: mkdir -p dist && rm -rf dist/* && mkdir -p dist/css && cp -r docs/fonts dist/ && cp -r docs/js dist/ && cp docs/themes/$npm_package_config_theme.* dist/css/ && rm dist-zip/$npm_package_config_theme-$npm_package_version.zip 2> /dev/null || true && zip -rq dist-zip/$npm_package_config_theme-$npm_package_version.zip dist/*
scripts.prep:docs: mkdir -p docs && rm -rf docs/* && mkdir -p docs/css && cp -r demo docs/ && cp -r fonts docs/ && cp -r js docs/ && cp index.html docs/
scripts.prep: npm run prep:dist-zip && npm run prep:docs && npm run prep:uglify
scripts.xbuild:css: lessc less/inviscss.less dist/css/inviscss.css --autoprefix && lessc demo/less/admin-demo.less dist/demo/css/admin-demo.css --autoprefix
scripts.xbuild:css.min: lessc less/inviscss.less --autoprefix --clean-css="--s1 --advanced --compatibility=ie9"  dist/css/inviscss.min.css  && lessc demo/less/admin-demo.less dist/demo/css/admin-demo.min.css --autoprefix  --clean-css="--s1 --advanced --compatibility=ie9"
scripts.xbuild: npm run prep && npm run build:css && npm run build:css.min && npm run build:demo
scripts.build: npm run prep && npm run build:make
scripts.build:open: echo 'building...' && npm run -s build && echo 'done' && open dist/demo/index.html
